about_the_game:
Voidwalker, a single-player retro first-person shooter, immerses you in the role of a Voidwalker, a void-walking traveler beyond reality's limits. Your mission: reverse the entropy plaguing your existential plane by exploring dimensions, redirecting energy from their solar systems. However, a recent failed jump leaves you stranded in a bizarre, brutalist world.

This desolate place is infested with strange entities, ancestral cults, and creatures echoing distant echoes of the past. Your task is not only to face the challenges of this corrupted world but also to uncover what transpired in this dark corner, once home to a prosperous civilization.

Engage in intense combat in chaotic, uncontrollable landscapes, where reality distortion challenges your vertical and horizontal thinking. Armed with both past and present technology, explore these surreal environments, unraveling secrets hidden in the shadows.

Voidwalker harnesses the power of the Quake engine to deliver an immersive, action-packed gaming experience. With retro graphics and frenetic gameplay, immerse yourself in a journey across multiple dimensions in search of answers and the opportunity to restore balance to your universe. Do you have what it takes to confront the forces of entropy and decipher the mysteries of this distorted world?


1.Explore Brutalist and Non-Euclidean Environments:

  • Immerse yourself in a twisted and decadent environment with maps featuring non-Euclidean brutalist structures, challenging logic, and providing visually stunning landscapes.

2.Classic Quake-Style Movement:

  • Experience the adrenaline of classic Quake movement, including bunny-hopping, wall-running, and zig-zagging for a dizzying gaming experience.

3.Terrifying Lovecraftian-Based Creatures:

  • Confront horrors beyond imagination with Lovecraftian-inspired creatures, adding a layer of cosmic horror to your gaming experience.

4.Powered by the Mighty Quake Engine:

  • Driven by the venerable Quake engine, experience smooth performance and stunning graphics that enhance the intensity and immersion of the game.

5.Atmospheric Soundtrack:
  • Dive into the unique experience of "Voidwalker" with a captivating soundtrack that blends dark ambient tones with industrial elements. The music heightens the game's atmosphere, taking immersion to new levels of excitement.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Voidwalker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 7950GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 710GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or better

short_description: Embark on a distorted journey as Voidwalker, battling chaotic entities and unraveling secrets to save your universe. With retro graphics and the Quake engine, brace yourself for intense first-person shooter combat.
